InstructionData.Title: FurnaceAutomate
InstructionData.Author: Rizzard of Oz
InstructionData.Instructions: #setup alias's alias furnace d0 alias isFull r0 start: # if furnace is full jump to activateFurnace, else jump to end ls isFull furnace 0 Occupied bne isFull 0 activateFurnace j end activateFurnace: s furnace Activate 1 end: sleep 3 j start
